00020    // Define and initialize static variable
00021    long Diagnostic::baseInterval = 1;
00022 
00023    void Diagnostic::initStatic()
00024    {  Diagnostic::baseInterval = 1; }
00025 
00026    /* 
00027    * Default constructor.
00028    */
00029    Diagnostic::Diagnostic(Simulation& simulation)
00030     : ParamComposite(),
00031       outputFileName_(),
00032       simulationPtr_(&simulation),
00033       interval_(1)
00034    {}
00035

00037    * Destructor.
00038    */
00039    Diagnostic::~Diagnostic()
00040    {}

00042    /*
00043    * Read the interval from parameter file, with error checking.
00044    */
00045    void Diagnostic::readInterval(std::istream &in) 
00046    {
00047    
00048       // Check that baseInterval has a nonzero, positive value
00049       if (baseInterval == 0) {
00050          UTIL_THROW("baseInterval == 0");
00051       }
00052       if (baseInterval < 0) {
00053          UTIL_THROW("baseInterval < 0");
00054       }
00055    
00056       // Read interval value (inherited from Interval)
00057       read<long>(in, "interval", interval_);
00058    
00059       // Check that interval has a nonzero, positive value
00060       if (interval_ == 0) {
00061          UTIL_THROW("interval_ == 0");
00062       }
00063       if (interval_ < 0) {
00064          UTIL_THROW("interval_ < 0");
00065       }
00066 
00067       // Check that interval is a multiple of baseInterval
00068       if (interval_ % baseInterval != 0) {
00069          UTIL_THROW("interval is not a multiple of baseInterval");
00070       }
00071    
00072    }
00073 
00074    /*
00075    * Read output file name and open output file.
00076    */
00077    void Diagnostic::readOutputFileName(std::istream &in) 
00078    {  
00079       read<std::string>(in, "outputFileName", outputFileName_); 
00080    }
00081 
00082    /*
00083    * Get the outputFileName string with an added suffix
00084    */
00085    std::string Diagnostic::outputFileName(const std::string& suffix) const
00086    {
00087       std::string filename = outputFileName_;
00088       filename += suffix;
00089       return filename;
00090    }
00091 
00092 }
00093 #endif
